D

DesktopLauncher - Class in edu.byu.rpg.desktop
This is the main desktop launcher for our game.
DesktopLauncher() - Constructor for class edu.byu.rpg.desktop.DesktopLauncher
 
destroy() - Method in class edu.byu.rpg.entities.base.UpdatableEntity
This function destroys this entity by adding a DestroyComponent to it.
DestroyComponent - Class in edu.byu.rpg.components
This component flags an entity for removal from RpgGame.engine at the end of the next update loop, essentially destroying it at the end of that update loop.
DestroyComponent() - Constructor for class edu.byu.rpg.components.DestroyComponent
 
DestroySystem - Class in edu.byu.rpg.systems
This system removes any entities from RpgGame.engine which are flagged for removal.
DestroySystem(RpgGame) - Constructor for class edu.byu.rpg.systems.DestroySystem
Assigns this system a priority of 2, meaning it will be executed last during each update loop (after UpdateSystem and DrawSystem).
dispose() - Method in class edu.byu.rpg.RpgGame
Disposes of RpgGame.assets and RpgGame.batch to prevent memory leaks.
dispose() - Method in class edu.byu.rpg.screens.ScreenBase
This is where you should dispose of any objects created for a screen that need to be manually disposed of.
dispose() - Method in class edu.byu.rpg.tools.Assets
This class disposes of all our loaded assets.
dm - Static variable in class edu.byu.rpg.systems.Mappers
The component mapper for DrawComponent.
draw(float, SpriteBatch) - Method in class edu.byu.rpg.entities.base.DrawableEntity
This is the draw function for this entity.
draw(float, SpriteBatch) - Method in class edu.byu.rpg.entities.EntityStaging
 
drawable - Variable in class edu.byu.rpg.components.DrawComponent
The entity whose draw logic should be executed each frame
DrawableEntity - Class in edu.byu.rpg.entities.base
This class is an extension of UpdatableEntity, So any object that implements this base class will be plugged directly into RpgGame.engine's update loop.
DrawableEntity(RpgGame) - Constructor for class edu.byu.rpg.entities.base.DrawableEntity
Automatically registers this entity with RpgGame.engine, and also adds a DrawComponent to this entity.
DrawComponent - Class in edu.byu.rpg.components
This class is the drawable counterpart to UpdateComponent.
DrawComponent(DrawableEntity) - Constructor for class edu.byu.rpg.components.DrawComponent
 
DrawSystem - Class in edu.byu.rpg.systems
This class hasn't been implemented yet...
DrawSystem(RpgGame) - Constructor for class edu.byu.rpg.systems.DrawSystem
Automatically sets up the comparator for sorting, and sets the priority to 1, meaning this system will be updated after UpdateSystem and before DestroySystem.
